alert.note: Alert for Clay; Craighead; Greene; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:16AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene, northeastern Craighead, northwestern Mississippi, central Clay and southwestern Dunklin Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 316 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Peach Orchard to near Beech Grove to near Fontaine. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Corning, Lake City, Leachville, Rector, Senath, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Marmaduke, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Lafe, Knobel, Peach Orchard and Delaplaine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
